alignments.name: Chaotic
alignments.description: Chaotic characters align themselves with destruction, ambition, and wickedness. Chaotic characters adopt a "survival of the fittest" mentality.

alignments.name: Lawful
alignments.description: Lawful characters align themselves with fairness, order, and virtue. Lawful characters operate from a "good of the whole" mentality.

alignments.name: Neutral
alignments.description: Neutral characters find balance between Law and Chaos. They align with the cycle of growth and decline, adopting a "nature must take its course" mentality.
